actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary  of the Interior to assist in the preservation of Fort Toulouse National Historic Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound in the State of Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide technical and financial assistance to the State of Alabama for the purpose of correcting slope failures and erosion problems along the Coosa River at the Fort Toulouse National Historical Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary  of the Interior to assist in the preservation of Fort Toulouse National Historic Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound in the State of Alabama.
